lines.text: [after Curly fires another arrow, and then finds that the Heavyset Prospector has it, after the arrow hit him in the butt, detecting the 'poke of gold' he had put in his back pocket]

[Matter-of-fact]
That's all I wanted to know!
[He fires his gun, spinning Curly's hat the other way. The three run off]
100,000 tons of pure gold. At $35 an ounce, think of it.
I can't. How much that in round numbers.

[Curly moves his head left to right with calculator sounds and ends with a ding, pulls calculator paper out of his mouth, reads it]
That's 80 billion, 61 million and 51 cents of a fraction.

[the prospectors slip a stick of dynamite with the fuse lit through the iron door where Moe, Larry and Curly are behind, Curly picks it up]
Oh, a roman candle... zhhhhhhhhh... boom! Cuckoo! 4th of July! Ha ha ha!
Hey, marblehead, you know what that thing is you're holding there? That's dynamite!
You mean the things with the... nyaaaaaaa!
[quickly slips it back through the hole in the door]
